title: New models from Tokyo, Electric vehicles roadtrip in SA - Top motoring stories of the week
text:
A number of new models were announced this week, with Audi sprucing up its RS4 Avant and BMW also unleashing its X5 M and X6 M Competition models due for arrival locally in May next year.

There is also a cool read about Garth Cupido who combined his passion for drawing and cars into visual representation. Some of his drawings include an Opel Kadett Superboss and a Ford Cortina.

The best of the rest

Datsun has been supporting local small businesses and bakery owner Babette Kourelos has been benefiting from the going where she needs to go with the frugal Datsun GO.

RoadTrip | The Last Overland - an old Defender drives back home from 1955 trip



Electric vehicles are slowly becoming a common site on European roads with more people now opting to go green. This has culminated in a drop in car sales and a massive rise in emission-free engine registrations in the UK.

Click on the links below to view the full article:
description: From the latest models being launched to a 65-year old Land Rover Defender taking a trip down memory lane, here are the top motoring stories of the week.
